ccre.drivers.chrobotics

Class UM7LT

  • java.lang.Object
    • ccre.drivers.chrobotics.UM7LT

  • public class UM7LT
extends java.lang.Object
    The high-level interface to the UM7-LT orientation sensor from CH Robotics, via RS232. http://www.chrobotics.com/shop/um7-lt-orientation-sensor
    Author:
    skeggsc

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  UM7LT.Faults
      A structure of the faults that the UM7 can have.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      BooleanStatus autoreportFaults
      Whether or not faults should be automatically logged.
      FloatInput eulerTime
      The current time reported by the UM7LT for the measurement of the Euler rotations.
      EventInput onEulerUpdate
      An event that fires whenever new data for the Euler angles becomes available.
      EventInput onHealthUpdate
      An event that fires whenever new data for the Health sensor becomes available.
      FloatInput pitch
      The current pitch rotation, in degrees.
      FloatInput pitchRate
      The current pitch rate, in degrees per second.
      FloatInput roll
      The current roll rotation, in degrees.
      FloatInput rollRate
      The current roll rate, in degrees per second.
      FloatInput yaw
      The current yaw rotation, in degrees.
      FloatInput yawRate
      The current yaw rate, in degrees per second.
      EventOutput zeroGyro
      Start zeroing the Gyro.
